item.title: Opinion Poll by Voxmeter for Ritzau, 18–24 June 2018 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Socialdemokraterne (S&D): 4–5 seats
  • Dansk Folkeparti (ECR): 3–4 seats

  • Det Konservative Folkeparti (EPP): 0–1 seats
  • Kristendemokraterne (EPP): 0 seats
  • Nye Borgerlige (*): 0 seats
